entries.journal_entry_description: Craft leggings for the Marauder smith.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: Craft three pairs of Mabari armor leggings.
entries.task02_journal_entry_description: Craft three pairs of Bone armor leggings.
entries.task03_journal_entry_description: Craft three pairs of Composite armor leggings.
entries.task04_journal_entry_description: Craft all three pairs of leggings.
entries.task05_journal_entry_description: Return to Macchbraus with the leggings.
